studentOfferings.name: GitHub Student Developer Pack
studentOfferings.description: Access the best developer tools, free of charge, for students. Includes GitHub Pro and other free services and credits from top technology companies.
studentOfferings.eligibility: Enrolled student with a valid academic email address

studentOfferings.name: Amazon Prime Student
studentOfferings.description: Get six months of free Amazon Prime, including free two-day shipping on millions of items, streaming of movies and TV shows, and more.
studentOfferings.eligibility: Enrolled student with a valid .edu email address
